scripts.install:win32: IF exist .\src\osu-performance ( cd src\osu-performance && git pull && cd ..\.. && npm run gyp_fix ) ELSE ( git clone --recursive https://github.com/ppy/osu-performance src/osu-performance && npm run gyp_fix )
scripts.install:darwin:linux: git clone --recursive https://github.com/ppy/osu-performance src/osu-performance 2>/dev/null || (cd src/osu-performance ; git pull ; cd ../..) && node inst.js && node-gyp rebuild && npm run gyp_fix
scripts.gyp_fix: npm run tinylogger_fix && npm run gyp_rebuild
